objects.text:
• Stunning turquoise ombré effect
• Holographic glitter finish
• Elegant stiletto design
• Limited edition collection

product_details.name: Enchanted Crystal Dreams - Luxury Holographic Glitter Stilettos
product_details.description:
• Stunning turquoise ombré effect with crackle glass-like design
• Multi-dimensional holographic glitter finish that shifts colors
• Premium high heel construction with elegant stiletto design
• Unique gradient pattern blending from aqua blue to iridescent bronze
• Eye-catching platform sole with glitter-encrusted details
• Perfect statement piece for special occasions and memorable events
• Expertly crafted with attention to detail and premium materials
• Show-stopping sparkle effect under any lighting condition
• Modern fairytale aesthetic with contemporary glamour
• Available in limited edition designer collection

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxurious, visually striking layout centered around high-fashion stilettos. The background features a deep navy gradient transitioning into teal with subtle layered curves and translucent circular accents, adding depth and movement. The top of the banner has a bold sans-serif title (`heading`) in vibrant turquoise, followed by a stylized serif subtitle (`subheading`) in rich magenta. A bulleted list (`description`) gives product highlights in white. Prominently displayed is a glittery turquoise and gold stiletto image (`product_image`), placed toward the right for dynamic focus. The price (`price`) is large, golden-yellow, and positioned boldly below. A call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in cyan with white text draws attention for conversions.

**Color Palette**:
- Navy Blue: #041C2C
- Teal: #05B5D4
- Magenta: #E55CFF
- Gold: #EFB05C
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a high-heeled shoe designed with a vibrant, iridescent color palette blending aqua blue and multicolor glitter. The upper part features a crystalline texture in shimmering turquoise (#00B8D9), fading into teal (#008080), creating a fluid glass-like effect. The lower portion dazzles with holographic fragments of magenta (#D63384), violet (#8A2BE2), orange (#FF8C00), and gold (#FFD700), enhancing depth and luminosity. These colors are intricately layered, giving a dynamic gradient and light-reflective quality. For an advertisement banner, a palette of #00B8D9, #D63384, #FF8C00, and #FFD700 can create a luxurious, futuristic, and bold impression that complements the product’s flair.
